General.Name: Arlington Asset Investment Corp
General.Description: Arlington Asset Investment Corp. (NYSE: AAIC) currently invests primarily in mortgage related and residential real estate and has elected to be taxed as a REIT. The Company is headquartered in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area. For more information, please visit www.arlingtonasset.com.
General.Address: 6862 Elm Street, McLean, VA, United States, 22101-1720
